note: the block on which the stain was performed, if identifiable

the name of the stain performed; need to harmonize with other table. Note that this is not exactly how the provider described it, necessarily.  See "Stain Pipeline" for documentation on how stains are captured.
The result of the stain performed, if identified. This is a good column to check for quality assurance - lots of junk lands here in cases for which the code is not functional.
